Package lib

Class ImgRaster

java.lang.Object
lib.ImgRaster
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class ImgRaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
ImgRaster class provides the ability to store pixel values and manipulate them in a raster.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static short ALPHA_PIXEL
    Represent the index of the alpha pixel in pixel value short array returned by splitColors(int) method.
    static short BLUE_PIXEL
    Represent the index of the blue pixel in pixel value short array returned by splitColors(int) method.
    static short GREEN_PIXEL
    Represent the index of the green pixel in pixel value short array returned by splitColors(int) method.
    (package private) int height
    Integer value to store number of rows in raster or so called height of the image.
    (package private) int[] pixels
    Pixel array to store pixel values
    static short RED_PIXEL
    Represent the index of the red pixel in pixel value short array returned by splitColors(int) method.
    (package private) int width
    Integer value to store number of columns in raster or so called width of the image.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ImgRaster()
    Default Constructor to create an empty instance of ImgRaster.
    ImgRaster​(int height, int width)
    Constructor to create an ImgRaster instance for a raster image with dimension specified by the parameter.
    ImgRaster​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
    Creates ImgRaster instance for given BufferedImage instance in parameter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected ImgRaster clone()
    Clones the current ImgRaster instance
    int[] copyOfPixels()
    Generates a copy of the pixels in raster
    int getHeight()
    Return height of the image represented by this raster.
    int getPixel​(int x, int y)
    Returns pixel value at specified position in raster
    int[] getPixels()
    Returns the pixel array of this raster as single dimension Integer array.
    int[][] getPixels2D()
    Generates a copy of pixel array in 2D format.
    int getSize()
    Returns the total number of pixels in the image represented by this raster.
    int getWidth()
    Returns the width of raster image
    boolean isEmpty()
    Checks whether the raster contains any data or not.
    static int joinColors​(int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)
    Joins seperate pixel components into a single integer pixel representation.
    static int joinColors​(short[] colors)
    Joins pixel component short array splitted by splitColors(int) into a single integer pixel representation.
    void readPixels​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
    Initiates pixel grabbing from the BufferedImage provided in parameter.
    void setPixel​(int x, int y, int value)
    Sets pixel value at specified position in raster
    static short[] splitColors​(int pixel)
    Splits the integer pixel representation of a color pixel in RGB or RGBA format into its components pixel value short array indexed by RED_PIXEL, GREEN_PIXEL, BLUE_PIXEL and ALPHA_PIXEL

    equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ImgRaster

      public ImgRaster()
      Default Constructor to create an empty instance of ImgRaster.

    • ImgRaster

      public ImgRaster​(int height, int width)
      Constructor to create an ImgRaster instance for a raster image with dimension specified by the parameter.
      Parameters:
      height - of the image raster
      width - of the image raster

    • ImgRaster

      public ImgRaster​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Creates ImgRaster instance for given BufferedImage instance in parameter. Then starts grabbing pixels from the image asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      image - BufferedImage instance to be converted to ImgRaster instance
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - on interruption while grabbing the pixels from the image

  • Method Details

    • readPixels

      public void readPixels​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Initiates pixel grabbing from the BufferedImage provided in parameter. Before any raster operations on empty ImgRaster instance one must call this method.
      Parameters:
      img - BufferedImage instance to read pixels from.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - on interruption during grabbing pixels from the image.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Return height of the image represented by this raster.
      Returns:
      height of the raster.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the total number of pixels in the image represented by this raster.
      Returns:
      number of pixels

    • getPixels

      public int[] getPixels()
      Returns the pixel array of this raster as single dimension Integer array.
      Returns:
      pixel array of this raster

    • copyOfPixels

      public int[] copyOfPixels()
      Generates a copy of the pixels in raster
      Returns:
      copy of the pixel array

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the width of raster image
      Returns:
      width of raster image

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel​(int x, int y, int value)
      Sets pixel value at specified position in raster
      Parameters:
      x - abcissa of the pixel in raster
      y - ordinate of the pixel in raster
      value - to be assigned

    • getPixel

      public int getPixel​(int x, int y)
      Returns pixel value at specified position in raster
      Parameters:
      x - abcissa of the pixel in raster
      y - ordinate of the pixel in raster
      Returns:
      pixel value specified by the coordinates in raster

    • getPixels2D

      public int[][] getPixels2D()
      Generates a copy of pixel array in 2D format.
      Returns:
      copy of pixel values in 2D Array format.

    • clone

      protected ImgRaster clone()
      Clones the current ImgRaster instance
      Overrides:
      clone in class java.lang.Object

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the raster contains any data or not.
      Returns:
      true if the raster contains any data, false otherwise.

    • splitColors

      public static short[] splitColors​(int pixel)
      Splits the integer pixel representation of a color pixel in RGB or RGBA format into its components pixel value short array indexed by RED_PIXEL, GREEN_PIXEL, BLUE_PIXEL and ALPHA_PIXEL
      Parameters:
      pixel - value to be splitted into components.
      Returns:
      the short array consisting RGBA values.

    • joinColors

      public static int joinColors​(int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)
      Joins seperate pixel components into a single integer pixel representation.
      Parameters:
      red - pixel value
      green - pixel value
      blue - pixel value
      alpha - pixel value
      Returns:
      integer representation of joined pixel.

    • joinColors

      public static int joinColors​(short[] colors)
      Joins pixel component short array splitted by splitColors(int) into a single integer pixel representation.
      Parameters:
      colors - short array containing splitted color pixels.
      Returns:
      integer representation of joined pixel.
